TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit SoapRpcMethodAttribute extends System.Attribute
Public NotInheritable Class SoapRpcMethodAttribute Inherits Attribute
public ref class SoapRpcMethodAttribute sealed : Attribute

summary.span: 指定发送至和源自该方法的 SOAP 消息使用 格式设置。

span.span: Specifies that SOAP messages sent to and from the method use formatting.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Web 服务描述语言 (WSDL) 为如何在 SOAP 消息中设置 XML Web service 方法或操作的格式定义两种样式： `RPC` 和 `Document` 。Web Services Description Language (WSDL) defines two styles for how an XML Web service method, or operation, can be formatted in a SOAP message: `RPC` and `Document`. `RPC` 格式设置是指根据用于 RPC 的 soap 规范对操作进行格式设置;其他称为 SOAP 规范的第7部分。`RPC` formatting refers to formatting the operation according to the SOAP specification for using SOAP for RPC; otherwise known as Section 7 of the SOAP specification. `RPC` 格式设置表明，所有参数都封装在 XML Web service 方法后面的一个名为的 XML 元素中，并且该 XML 元素中的每个 XML 元素都表示一个名为的参数，该元素以它所表示的参数命名。`RPC` formatting states that all parameters are encapsulated within a single XML element named after the XML Web service method and that each XML element within that XML element represents a parameter named after the parameter it is representing. 在和样式中格式化的 SOAP 消息 `RPC` `Document` 可用于与远程过程调用中的 XML WEB SERVICE (RPC) 方式进行通信; 但是， `Document` 也可以轻松地使用该样式以松散耦合的方式进行通信。SOAP messages formatted in both the `RPC` and `Document` styles can be used to communicate with an XML Web service in a Remote Procedure Call (RPC) manner; however the `Document` style can also easily be used to communicate in a loosely coupled manner. 因此， `Document` 建议使用样式 XML Web services。Therefore, `Document` style XML Web services is recommended. 有关更多详细信息，请参阅 `Customizing SOAP Messages` 主题。For more details, see the `Customizing SOAP Messages` topic. 有关更多详细信息，请参阅 [自定义 SOAP 消息格式](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/dkwy2d72(v=vs.100))。For more details, see [Customizing SOAP Message Formatting](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/dkwy2d72(v=vs.100)). 此特性可应用于服务器上的 XML Web service 方法和客户端上的代理类。This attribute can be applied to an XML Web service method on the server and a proxy class on the client. 将属性设置为不能访问其的 XML Web service 方法 `true` 。XML Web service methods that have the property set to `true` do not have access to their . 同样，访问类的任何属性都将 返回 `null` 。As such, accessing any of the properties of the class return `null`. ## Examples 下面的代码示例将 XML Web service 方法的消息样式设置为 `Rpc` `GetUserName` 。The following code example sets the message style to `Rpc` for the `GetUserName` XML Web service method. [!code-aspx-csharp[SoapRpcMethodAttribute#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/SoapRpcMethodAttribute/CS/sourcecs.asmx)] [!code-aspx-vb[SoapRpcMethodAttribute#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/SoapRpcMethodAttribute/VB/sourcevb.asmx)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ Action { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.Action : string with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置 SOAP 请求的 HTTP 标头字段。

span.span: Gets or sets the HTTP header field of the SOAP request.

value.span: SOAP 请求的 HTTP 标头字段。

span.span: The HTTP header field of the SOAP request.

value.span: 默认值为 http://tempuri.org/MethodName ，其中方法名称是 XML Web service 方法的名称。

span.span: The default is http://tempuri.org/MethodName where MethodName is the name of the XML Web service method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 通常， 属性是一个 URI，用于指示 SOAP 请求的意图。Typically, the property is a URI indicating the intent of the SOAP request. 不过，SOAP 规范不会限制格式，也不会对 URI 是否引用现有文档。However, the SOAP specification places no restrictions on the format and whether the URI refers to an existing document. Web 服务器（如防火墙）可以使用该属性的状态和内容来 适当筛选 HTTP 中的 SOAP 请求消息。The presence and content of the property can be used by Web servers such as firewalls to appropriately filter SOAP request messages in HTTP. 默认情况下，.NET Framework 版本1.1 将 在 `soapAction` `soap:operation` 为 XML WEB SERVICE 生成的 WSDL 文档中的每个受支持的 SOAP 绑定的元素的属性中发布属性。By default, the .NET Framework version 1.1 publishes the property in the `soapAction` attribute of the `soap:operation` element for each supported SOAP binding in WSDL documents generated for an XML Web service. 支持的 SOAP 绑定是 SOAP 1.1。The supported SOAP binding is SOAP 1.1. 有关详细信息，请参阅 W3C 网站上的 [SOAP](https://www.w3.org/TR/soap/) 规范。For more information, see the [SOAP](https://www.w3.org/TR/soap/) specification on the W3C website. ## Examples 下面的代码示例将 属性设置为 `http://www.contoso.com/Sample` 。The following code example sets the property to `http://www.contoso.com/Sample`. [!code-aspx-csharp[SoapRpcMethodAttribute.Action#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/SoapRpcMethodAttribute.Action/CS/sourcecs.asmx)] [!code-aspx-vb[SoapRpcMethodAttribute.Action#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/SoapRpcMethodAttribute.Action/VB/sourcevb.asmx)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ Binding { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.Binding : string with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置 XML Web services 方法为其实现操作的绑定。

span.span: Gets or sets the binding that an XML Web service method implements an operation for.

value.span: XML Web services 方法为其实现操作的绑定。

span.span: The binding an XML Web service method implements an operation for.

value.span: 默认为追加了“Soap”的 XML Web services 名称。

span.span: The default is the name of the XML Web service with "Soap" appended.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 由 Web 服务描述语言 (WSDL) 定义的绑定类似于接口，因为它定义一组具体的操作。A binding, as defined by Web Services Description Language (WSDL), is similar to an interface in that it defines a concrete set of operations. 对于 ASP.NET，每个 XML Web service 方法都是绑定中的一个操作。With respect to ASP.NET, each XML Web service method is an operation within a binding. XML Web service 方法是在应用到 XML Web service 的中指定的 XML Web service 或绑定的默认绑定的成员 。XML Web service methods are members of the default binding for an XML Web service or a binding specified within a applied to an XML Web service. 如果将多个属性应用于一个 XML Web service，则 XML Web service 可以实现多个绑定 。An XML Web service can implement multiple bindings, if multiple attributes are applied to an XML Web service. 将一个或多个 特性应用到 XML Web service 后， 或 可应用于单个 XML Web service 方法以指示特定 XML Web service 方法实现的绑定操作。Once one or more attributes are applied to an XML Web service, a or can be applied to individual XML Web service methods to indicate the binding operation implemented by a particular XML Web service method. 设置 或的属性 ，以指定 XML Web service 方法为其实现操作的绑定。Set the property of or to specify the binding an XML Web service method implements an operation for. 只有一个 或 可应用于 XML Web service 方法。Only one or can be applied to an XML Web service method. 因此，XML Web service 方法只能实现一个绑定的操作。Therefore, an XML Web service method can only implement an operation for one binding. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何在 XML Web service 中实现多个绑定。The following code example demonstrates how to implement multiple bindings within an XML Web service. [!code-aspx-csharp[SoapRpcMethodAttribute.Binding#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/SoapRpcMethodAttribute.Binding/CS/bindingcs.asmx)] [!code-aspx-vb[SoapRpcMethodAttribute.Binding#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/SoapRpcMethodAttribute.Binding/VB/bindingvb.asmx)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool OneWay { bool get(); void set(bool value); };
member this.OneWay : bool with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置 XML Web services 客户端是否等待 Web 服务器完成对 XML Web services 方法的处理。

span.span: Gets or sets whether an XML Web service client waits for the Web server to finish processing an XML Web service method.

value.span: 如果 XML Web services 客户端不等待 Web 服务器完成对 XML Web services 方法的处理，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the XML Web service client does not wait for the Web server to completely process an XML Web service method; otherwise, .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当 XML Web service 方法的 属性设置为时 `true` ，XML Web service 客户端不必等待 Web 服务器完成处理 XML Web service 方法。When an XML Web service method has the property set to `true`, the XML Web service client does not have to wait for the Web server to finish processing the XML Web service method. 一旦 Web 服务器对进行反序列化 ，但在调用 XML Web service 方法之前，服务器将返回 HTTP 202 状态代码。As soon as the Web server has deserialized the , but before it invokes the XML Web service method, the server returns an HTTP 202 status code. HTTP 202 状态代码向客户端指示 Web 服务器已经开始处理消息。An HTTP 202 status code indicates to the client that the Web server has started processing the message. 因此，XML Web service 客户端不会收到 Web 服务器成功处理该消息的确认。Therefore, an XML Web service client receives no acknowledgment that the Web server successfully processed the message. 单向方法不能有返回值或任何 `out` 参数。One-way methods cannot have a return value or any `out` parameters. 如果使用的是 .NET Framework 版本 1.0 XML Web service 方法，这些方法应用了 或 特性，并将 属性设置为，则 `true` 不允许 使用静态 属性访问这些方法。If you are using the .NET Framework version 1.0 XML Web service methods that have either the or attribute applied to them with the property set to `true`, do not allow access to their using the static property. 若要访问 ，请派生类实现 XML Web service 方法， 并访问 属性。To access the , derive the class implementing the XML Web service method from and access the property. ## Examples 下面的代码示例将 属性设置为 `true` 。The following code example sets the property to `true`. [!code-aspx-csharp[SoapRpcMethodAttribute.OneWay#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/SoapRpcMethodAttribute.OneWay/CS/sourcecs.asmx)] [!code-aspx-vb[SoapRpcMethodAttribute.OneWay#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/SoapRpcMethodAttribute.OneWay/VB/sourcevb.asmx)]

summary.span: 获取或设置与 XML Web services 方法的 SOAP 请求关联的 XML 元素。

span.span: Gets or sets the XML element associated with the SOAP request for an XML Web service method.

value.span: 与 XML Web services 方法的 SOAP 请求关联的 XML 元素。

span.span: The XML element associated with the SOAP request for an XML Web service method.

value.span: 默认值是 XML Web services 方法的名称。

span.span: The default value is the name of the XML Web service method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性已过时。This property is obsolete. 它不会影响任何行为。It does not affect any behavior. ## Examples 下面的代码示例将 属性设置为 `MyCustomRequestElement` 。The following code example sets the property to `MyCustomRequestElement`. span.span: The XML namespace associated with the SOAP request for an XML Web service method.
The default is http://tempuri.org/.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的代码示例将 属性设置为 `http://www.contoso.com` 。The following code example sets the property to `http://www.contoso.com`. summary.span: 获取或设置与 XML Web services 方法的 SOAP 响应关联的 XML 元素。

span.span: Gets or sets the XML element associated with the SOAP response for an XML Web service method.

value.span: 与 XML Web services 方法的 SOAP 请求关联的 XML 元素。

span.span: The XML element associated with the SOAP request for an XML Web service method.

value.span: 默认值为 WebServiceNameResult，其中 WebServiceName 是 XML Web service 方法的名称。

span.span: The default value is WebServiceNameResult, where WebServiceName is the name of the XML Web service method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性定义用于封装 SOAP 响应的元素中的参数的 XML 元素 `Body` 。The property defines the XML element used to encapsulate the parameters within the `Body` element of the SOAP response. ## Examples 下面的代码示例将 属性设置为 `MyCustomResponseElement` 。The following code example sets the property to `MyCustomResponseElement`. [!code-aspx-csharp[SoapRpcMethodAttribute.ResponseNamespace#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/SoapRpcMethodAttribute.ResponseNamespace/CS/examplecs.asmx)] [!code-aspx-vb[SoapRpcMethodAttribute.ResponseNamespace#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/SoapRpcMethodAttribute.ResponseNamespace/VB/examplevb.asmx)]

summary.span: 获取或设置与 XML Web services 方法的 SOAP 响应关联的 XML 命名空间。

span.span: Gets or sets the XML namespace associated with the SOAP response for an XML Web service method.

value.span: 与 XML Web services 方法的 SOAP 响应关联的 XML 命名空间。

span.span: The XML namespace associated with the SOAP response for an XML Web service method.
The default is http://tempuri.org/.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性在其服务说明中的 XML Web service 方法的 XSD 架构中使用。The property is used in the XSD schema for the XML Web service method in its service description. ## Examples 下面的代码示例将 属性设置为 `http://www.contoso.com` 。The following code example sets the property to `http://www.contoso.com`. [!code-aspx-csharp[SoapRpcMethodAttribute.ResponseNamespace#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/SoapRpcMethodAttribute.ResponseNamespace/CS/examplecs.asmx)] [!code-aspx-vb[SoapRpcMethodAttribute.ResponseNamespace#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/SoapRpcMethodAttribute.ResponseNamespace/VB/examplevb.asmx)]

summary.span: 获取或设置在调用该方法时所使用的绑定。

span.span: Gets or sets the binding used when invoking the method.

value.span: 枚举的成员，指定在调用该方法时所使用的绑定。

span.span: A member of the enumeration specifying the binding used when invoking the method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性的默认值为 。The default value of this property is .
